about.title: About Us
about.p1: Geekshive is a company built by geeks, for geeks. With over 15 years in the e-commerce world, we've grown from a passion project into a full-scale distribution and logistics partner for global brands.
about.p2: We specialize in marketplace strategy, product positioning, and fulfillment — always focused on making geek culture accessible and engaging for customers across the Americas.

francisco.title: Chief Executive Officer
francisco.desc: CEO responsible for global strategy, growth, and operational performance across the US and LATAM.

joaquin.title: Regional Director of Operations – LATAM South
joaquin.desc: Leads the commercial and operational strategy in Argentina, Colombia, and Chile, optimizing pricing, promotions, and profitability.

agustin.title: Regional Director of Operations – Mexico & Brasil
agustin.desc: Responsible for growth, positioning, and profitability optimization in the Mexico and Brasil markets.

matias.title: Director of Amazon & Brand Development
matias.desc: Leads the Amazon unit, strategic supplier development, and the creation and positioning of proprietary brands.

valentina.title: Chief Technology & Automation Officer
valentina.desc: Leads technological infrastructure, automation, and internal systems that power data-driven decision making.

about.missionText: To empower passionate consumers across the Americas by delivering curated, geek-inspired products through innovative e-commerce experiences, while helping brands thrive on marketplaces through tech-driven strategies and fulfillment excellence.

brands.title: Our Brands
brands.description: We partner with the most innovative and exciting brands in geek culture. From gaming to collectibles, our curated selection brings you the best products from industry leaders and emerging creators.

marketplaces.title: Where We Sell
marketplaces.subtitle: We operate across the largest e-commerce platforms in the Americas, delivering products to thousands of customers every day.
marketplaces.ml_mx_desc: We have an active and growing presence in **Mexico's largest online marketplace**. With a solid logistics network and authorized seller status, we ensure **reliable fulfillment and visibility** for every product. Our strategy focuses on localization, fast delivery, and listing optimization tailored to Mexican buyers.
marketplaces.ml_ar_desc: In Argentina, we specialize in **launching and scaling brands** through custom content, efficient inventory handling, and promotional placement. As official sellers, we bring **local experience and market insight** into one of South America's most competitive digital spaces.
marketplaces.amazon_desc: With over **15 years of experience** on Amazon and more than **62,000 verified reviews**, Geekshive is one of the most **trusted sellers** on the platform. We support both FBA logistics and help products grow by placing them into a system built for **conversion, performance, and brand visibility**.

expanding.title: Also on
expanding.subtitle: We're growing our footprint across Latin America. These are the markets where we're also selling through Mercado Libre.

brasil.name: Brasil
brasil.desc: Reaching one of the world's largest e-commerce markets. We bring geek culture and curated products to Brazilian buyers through Mercado Libre's robust platform.

chile.name: Chile
chile.desc: Serving Chilean consumers with a growing catalog of premium products. Our operations leverage fast logistics and localized strategies to connect with this dynamic market.

colombia.name: Colombia
colombia.desc: Tapping into Colombia's fast-growing digital commerce landscape. We offer competitive pricing and reliable fulfillment to customers across the country.

boosting.questionTitle: Is Your Brand Stuck in a Sales Plateau?
boosting.questionDesc:
Struggling to grow your marketplace presence? Don't know how to break through to the next level?
We've helped brands like yours transform their marketplace performance.
boosting.title: Brand Boosting Services
boosting.desc: Take your marketplace presence to the next level with our comprehensive brand boosting services. Whether you're on Amazon or Mercado Libre, we help brands grow through strategic account management and optimization.
boosting.ctaDesc: Let's discuss how we can help your brand grow on Amazon and Mercado Libre. Our team of experts is ready to create a customized strategy for your success.

account.title: Account Management
account.desc: Full-service management of your seller account on Amazon and Mercado Libre. We handle everything from inventory to customer service, letting you focus on your brand.

storefront.title: Storefront Enhancement
storefront.desc: Transform your marketplace presence with a professional, conversion-focused storefront that stands out from competitors.

listingOpt.title: Listing Optimization
listingOpt.desc: Maximize your product visibility and conversion rates with data-driven listing optimization strategies.

listingCreate.title: Listing Creation
listingCreate.desc: Professional listing creation service that ensures your products make a strong first impression and drive sales.

marketing.title: Marketing & Promotion
marketing.desc: Strategic marketing campaigns to boost your brand visibility and drive sales on marketplaces.

analytics.title: Analytics & Reporting
analytics.desc: Comprehensive analytics and regular reporting to track your brand's performance and growth.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.desc: Have questions about our products or services? We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

doss.headline: Geekshive brought the brand DOSS to Argentina and Mexico
doss.features: Premium speakers • Superior sound • Bluetooth 5.3 • Affordable prices • Water resistant
